name: Endless Falling Simulator
description:
THIS IS A PROJECT FOR THE CARTRIDGE JAM 3!

Endless Falling Simulator is a basic, endless runner type game. As you fall, avoid spikes that are moving towards you. But be careful, the farther you fall the faster the spikes come!

How high of a score can you get?

CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys to Move the Character

The first version of this game was made in 2 Hours and 56 Minutes as a part of a 3 Hour Game Development Challenge. However, I will be updating the game to make it a bit more appealing and maybe add some more features!
